Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: The log shows activities RA VF AE RMI VF AD SC AC main sequence RA VF AE then optional RMI VF before AD traces Case1 RA VF AE RMI VF AD SC AC Case2 RA VF AE AD SC AC Case3 RA VF AE RMI RMI VF AD SC AC

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: optional block after AE one or more RMI then VF zero times in case2 one RMI VF in case1 two RMIs VF in case3 loop for RMI with tau redo allows multiple RMIs consecutive then VF

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: optionalBlock XOR tau seq loop RMI tau VF main seq RA VF AE optionalBlock AD SC AC tree structure -> RA -> VF -> AE -> X tau -> * RMI tau VF -> AD -> SC AC

Name: Validation - PE
Text: simulate traces case2 XOR tau skip yields RA VF AE AD SC AC case1 loop RMI exit then VF case3 loop RMI tau RMI then VF matches all traces

Name: Backtracking - NE
Text: alternative loop RMI VF repeats pair produces RMI VF RMI VF not matching case3 RMI RMI VF optional RMI VF loop wrong patterns rejected

Name: Counterfactual Reasoning - IND
Text: if loop included AE again would repeat AE not in log VF after loop without RMI would add extra VF not in case2

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: model uses sequence XOR loop balances fitness precision simplicity no parallel needed sequential log captures repetitions
